Deficiency Narrative:
It was found that a staff member escorted residents from the operation to a discount department store, purchased phones for the youth, and offered children vapes.
It was also found that after allegations were made by the victims, the alleged perpetrator was informed of the allegations by another staff member. The alleged perpetrator then attempted to speak with the victims about the allegations.
Correction Narrative: The operation is no longer operating and no longer has children in care. Their license has been revoked at this time.

Deficiency Narrative: A staff did not provide youth with a safe environment when he engaged in inappropriate sexual activity with children in their care. Staff confessed to law enforcement that he took the youth to Walmart, sexually abused them, and had naked photos of the girls on his phone.
